description: The Front Page of your life
title: UnreadAI
introduction: Your personal AI reads for you, saving you time. Forget about clickbait, focus on what matters. You choose what it reads: your emails, chats, news, podcasts. Get a daily digest tailored to your life, never miss a thing.

faqs.question: What types of content can the AI read?
faqs.answer: The AI can read personal messages, work emails, personal emails, social media updates, Reddit threads, News articles, GitHub notifications, Trello boards, and Podcasts.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial available.
